    LEDs, Lamps & Displays

    The firmware provides three basic classes to run lamps, LEDs and the ftSwarmControl’s builtin OLED display.

    • Use FtSwarmLamp for all types of fischertechnik Lamps and LEDs connected to M1 and M2 outputs.
    • Use FtSwarmLED for ftSwarm’s builtin RGB-LEDs or external connected ftPixels.
    • Use FtSwarmOLED for ftSwarmControl’s builtin OLED display.

    LED white (162134)

    Rainbow LED (162136)

    Light barriers LED (162135)

    Lens tip lamp (37875)

    ftPixel

    RGB LED ftSwarm

    OLED ftSwarmControl
